=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Tara Stiles This is Yoga : 4 DVD Set : Complete Yoga Encyclopedia: Daily Yoga + Beginners Yoga + AM/PM Yoga + Complete Yoga Library for Everyone Review Date: 2013/04/18 Store: Tara Stiles (Actor), Darren Capik (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Contributor': 'Tara Stiles, Darren Capik', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Runtime': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 5 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Director': 'Darren Capik', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen, Surround Sound', 'Run time': '5 hours and 53 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 7, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tara Stiles', 'Studio': 'Watch It Now Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '4'} Review Text: This is a great value and great series. I saw Tara on You Tube and loved her style.

All 4 of the DVD's are excellent. These are recorded in various venues. The atmospheres are minimalistic and there is no backgound music. Tara directs you through the poses in her earthy approach to yoga. She is beautiful, talented, and humble.

She studied ballet in her youth and it shows. She is so graceful. Thanks Tara for your beautiful Diva style of yoga!

She has a studio in NYC, if you live there or travel it would be fun to drop in for a class. She has lots of videos on You Tube, so check her out and get this DVD set if you like her style. Review Title: Tara is the Diva of earthbound yoga with minimal ego Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/03/18 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Betty Thomas'], 'Producers': ['Ivan Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Howard Stern', 'Robin Quivers', 'Mary McCormack'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} Review Text: I must confess that I get a huge kick out of Howard, and I loved this movie. This is the real deal, a slice of how Howard got to be the King of All Media.

Even if you are not a big fan of Howard, you might still like seeing how he had to fight his way to the top of the pile against mainstream media and the FCC.

But if you are a fan of Howard, you will love this movie. His ex-wife Alison stars as herself, Robin as herself, Babbabooie as himself, and the very talented Fred as himself. The NBC exec (aka Pig Vomit) is very well done by Paul Giamotti.

You will get to see the very personal sensitive side of Howard on screen. Too fun, and too funny!

Although this is a 1997 film, it is still relevant today. A good slice of the 80's and how we listen to radio today.

I also bought the soundtrack because I love the Rob Zombie song The Great American Nightmare that starts off Howard's show. Here is the link, it is loads of fun too.

This might have been someone's college film project, then I would say good effort.

BAD movie. BAD acting. BAD CGI. In a word ... SUCKS.

Not even funny. Take a BIG pass on this sucker. Review Title: BAD. Review Title: Don't waste your precious time with this crap of a movie Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Marilyn Manson - Guns, God and Government World Tour Review Date: 2014/11/01 Store: Marilyn Manson (Actor, Director), Twiggy Ramirez (Actor) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Music Videos & Concerts Product Description: ['Guns, God And Government Live In L.A. was filmed on the last night of the world tour in support of the Holy Wood album. When originally released on DVD in 2002, the visual footage of Guns, God And Government was taken from numerous concerts around the world during the tour, set to the audio soundtrack from the Los Angeles show. Now for the first time, this DVD presents the original high-definition L.A. footage and soundtrack together as a cohesive concert film. The spectacular staging, the costumes, the lighting and thecharismatic presence of Marilyn Manson himself combine to make this the ultimate live Marilyn Mansonrelease. / TRACK LISTING: 1) Irresponsible Hate Anthem 2) The Reflecting God 3) Great Big White World 4) Disposable Teens 5) The Fight Song 6) The Nobodies 7) Rock Is Dead 8) The Dope Show 9) Crucifiction In Space 10) Sweet Dreams (Are Made Of This) 11) The Love Song 12) Antichrist Superstar 13) The Beautiful People 14) Astonishing Panorama Of Endtimes 15) Lunchbox'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Music Videos & Concerts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Marilyn Manson, John 5, M.W. Gacy, Twiggy Ramirez, Ginger Fish', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Marilyn Manson', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 29, 2002', 'Actors': 'Marilyn Manson, Twiggy Ramirez, Ginger Fish, M.W. Gacy, John 5', 'Studio': 'Eagle Rock Ent', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: What a great concert montage! I almost felt like I was at the concert(s). MM is a perfectionist and attends to every single detail in his performances. You gotta love that in any performer.

Great editing from MM concerts worldwide on the Guns, God, Govt tour into one wonderful unique concert for this DVD. The sound is great, so plan on cranking it up LOUD.

I loved seeing the entire band play with reckless abandon. They all poured 110% into their performances. The costumes were great, lighting was perfect, special effects were terrific!

The Death Parade film is a behind the scenes look at the band which was fun, except I could have done without the temper tantrums.

I have watched this twice already this week, and I will be watching it many more times. WAY too much fun! LOVED IT>

BTW: This DVD is a "Must Have" for any MM fan! Review Title: Wild reckless FUN! Gacy, Marilyn Manson and the Spooky Kids, Daisy Berkowitz, Gidget Gein', 'Studio': 'Candlelight', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: This video is about Marilyn Manson, but not made by him. It is ok, but not great. There are a few short commentaries, but the majority of the video is out takes from the bands very early start in super small venues. This DVD is not a blockbuster of information, but interesting nonetheless.

You can see it online on YouTube for what it is worth, but even the biggest MM fan doesn't need to own a copy of this one.

Your money could be better spent buying a copy of the Guns, God, Government tour on DVD. It is OH SO GOOD. The crowd & the band are loving this music.
Here is the link

Review Title: My favorite background piece on Amy Winehouse Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/11/20 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Azure Productions'], 'Studio': ['Azure']} Review Text: What a droning bore! This video reads like a poorly written research paper. The story is literally read by a droning bore narrator. Not a single note of Amy's music is played. It is like watching a really bad slide show from 30 years ago. The video also lacks proper editing as the same info and pics are repeated in various parts of the video.

Take a big pass on buying or renting this video. It is free for Amazon Prime members, but seeing it once will be all that you can stand. It really puts your patience to the test.

Your money is better spent on these 2 videos/DVD
- Amy Winehouse The Girl Done Good on DVD or Amazon Video
DVD- http://www.amazon.com/Amy-Winehouse-Girl-Done-Good/dp/B0015WJC2Y/ref=cm_cr_pr_pb_t

Review Title: In summary- BAD Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/01/24 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Sexy Intellectual']} Review Text: This was a great summary of Adele's rise to fame. Adele is humble unlike most celebrities. She sings from the heart, and obviously she has a very big heart. She is what she is, and in that way she is unique.

I really enjoyed the video/DVD, because I did not know much of her history. I like her even more after seeing this slice of her life.

You go girl. Review Title: Strong, emotional, and soulful = Adele Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/10/10 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Partland'], 'Producers': ['Art Horan', 'Dan Partland'], 'Starring': ['George Conway', 'Anthony Scaramucci', 'Bill Kristol'], 'Studio': ['Dark Star Pictures']} Review Text: This movie is a MUST see. It is a walk through on the rise of authoritarian leaders over the last 100 years, alongside Trump's actions which line up perfectly with his desire to stay in power in 2020 and when that failed, plan a run again in 2024. If you don't find this alarming, especially in light of the events in Jan 2021, then you need to review the horrific regimes of Hitler, Stalin, Mussolini, and Franco.

Trump's psychology and actions are brilliantly reviewed by leading psychologists followed by analysis. It really is amazing. I will watch this again to let it really soak in. Unbelievably scary. Review Title: You MUST see this movie! Burns p.g.a', 'Kerry Orent', 'Michael Sugar', 'Eddy Moretti', 'Danny Gabai'], 'Starring': ['Adam Driver', 'Annette Bening', 'Jon Hamm'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: A dark docu drama about the interrogation of Al Qaeda suspects of 9/11 terrorist attacks. Focuses on CIA interrogation tactics used on suspects, and the ethical and legal ramifications of the techniques recommended by psychologist contractors who advised the CIA. Scenes are realistic and hard to watch, so not for immature audiences. Reviews the Senate committee investigation of the CiA Enhanced Interrogation Techniques program and conflicts within goverment agencies regarding the results of the investigation. Still relevant and riveting issues.

Acting, cinematography, casting were all top notch.

I highly recommend this film. Well done ia all respects. Review Title: Brilliant original movie by Amazon producers Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Strong, emotional, and soulful = Adele Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/10/10 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Partland'], 'Producers': ['Art Horan', 'Dan Partland'], 'Starring': ['George Conway', 'Anthony Scaramucci', 'Bill Kristol'], 'Studio': ['Dark Star Pictures']} Review Text: This movie is a MUST see. It is a walk through on the rise of authoritarian leaders over the last 100 years, alongside Trump's actions which line up perfectly with his desire to stay in power in 2020 and when that failed, plan a run again in 2024. If you don't find this alarming, especially in light of the events in Jan 2021, then you need to review the horrific regimes of Hitler, Stalin, Mussolini, and Franco.

Trump's psychology and actions are brilliantly reviewed by leading psychologists followed by analysis. It really is amazing. I will watch this again to let it really soak in. Unbelievably scary. Burns p.g.a', 'Kerry Orent', 'Michael Sugar', 'Eddy Moretti', 'Danny Gabai'], 'Starring': ['Adam Driver', 'Annette Bening', 'Jon Hamm'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: A dark docu drama about the interrogation of Al Qaeda suspects of 9/11 terrorist attacks. Focuses on CIA interrogation tactics used on suspects, and the ethical and legal ramifications of the techniques recommended by psychologist contractors who advised the CIA. Scenes are realistic and hard to watch, so not for immature audiences. Reviews the Senate committee investigation of the CiA Enhanced Interrogation Techniques program and conflicts within goverment agencies regarding the results of the investigation. Still relevant and riveting issues.

Acting, cinematography, casting were all top notch.

I highly recommend this film. Well done ia all respects. Review Title: Brilliant original movie by Amazon producers Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

target_interaction.title: US Embassy in Benghazi docu drama- fair/good depiction of actual events
target_interaction.text:
Starts out a little rough with macho mercenary setup, but gets better after 10-15 minutes. Lots of battle engagement, some humor, and emotional reflection of life events by characters seemed contrived at times. Didn't include enough background info to setup the story properly. Left out the details of Obama cabinet & Hilary Clinton Secretary of State interaction/communicatons during the crisis.

Filmed in Malta with some beautiful scenes. Ended with a beutiful song by Chris Cornell that I had never heard.
